__e: If you have any idea where he is or any information that might be helpful in finding him, I suggest that now's the time to speak.
No friends or family who can help us?
I'm only talking about a few blokes to back us up.
No friends or family who can help us?
I'm only talking about a few blokes to back us up.
I'm mad at the people who might want to hurt us, but mad at myself, too, for not standing up to them.
Did it never occur to you that some of the people who work for you may also be friends of mine?
Some of them might be girls.
I think some of them might be cops.
The League is scattered. They could be anywhere in the world.
And i told you they could be anybody.
- Well, they'd be anywhere by now.
They could be in danger, so if you know where they are, you need to tell us.
I'm thinking thing one and thing two Might be a lot like you and the big guy.
And you've been with a lot of women who might be better in bed than I am.
We're worried they might have gambling problems.
If someone else did this to you, you need to tell me, because it's wrong, and they could get in trouble.
I just my friends might have a problem with the fact that you tried to kill Sam that one time, but that's all.
If someone else did this to you, you need to tell me, because it's wrong, and they could get in trouble.
That they just might have seen something that happened.
Why can't they just tell us where to go and let us get on with it?
Someone they can't say no to.
And even if they were home, they can't protect me.
Um, you had asked me to advise you of any new pieces that might be of interest, and I've come across one or two things, so when do you think you might be able to visit the shop?
And of course I told them that, but they say they have some information that might interest you about the location of your stolen airbenders.
I hate to bring business into this but I have some product in my car if anyone's interested.
I know that, and you know that, but others might see you as a suspect.
I can't tell you about that, because if I did ...then they'd have to kill you.
Because there are things i know that could get you killed!
I think I know where they might go.
We were opposed to the war, of course but we don't try to say that too loudly here because people might get the wrong idea
You have no idea where she might meet him, if... that's his plan ?
